detectors.description:
ProtectTheCastle () contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:

	- [citizensAmounts.push(amount * 2)]()

detectors.description:

[ProtectTheCastle]() contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:

detectors.description: ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle() () ignores return value by msg.sender.send(msg.value - 100000000000000000000) ()
ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle() () ignores return value by citizensAddresses[citizensAddresses.length - 1].send(piggyBank) ()
ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle() () ignores return value by citizensAddresses[citizensAddresses.length - 1].send(piggyBank * 55 / 100) ()
ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle() () ignores return value by msg.sender.send(msg.value) ()
ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle() () ignores return value by citizensAddresses[citizensAddresses.length - 2].send(piggyBank * 35 / 100) ()
ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle() () ignores return value by jester.send(amount * 3 / 100) ()
ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle() () ignores return value by citizensAddresses[lastCitizenPaid].send(citizensAmounts[lastCitizenPaid]) ()
ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle() () ignores return value by citizensAddresses[citizensAddresses.length - 3].send(piggyBank * 15 / 100) ()
ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle() () ignores return value by citizensAddresses[citizensAddresses.length - 1].send(piggyBank * 65 / 100) ()
ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle() () ignores return value by citizensAddresses[citizensAddresses.length - 2].send(piggyBank * 30 / 100) ()
ProtectTheCastle.collectFee() () ignores return value by bribedCitizen.send(collectedFee) ()

ProtectTheCastle.newJester(address).newJester () shadows:
	- ProtectTheCastle.newJester(address) () (function)

ProtectTheCastle.newBribedCitizen(address).newBribedCitizen () shadows:
	- ProtectTheCastle.newBribedCitizen(address) () (function)

ProtectTheCastle.newJester(address).newJester () lacks a zero-check on :
		- jester = newJester ()

ProtectTheCastle.newBribedCitizen(address).newBribedCitizen () lacks a zero-check on :
		- bribedCitizen = newBribedCitizen ()
ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle() () has external calls inside a loop: citizensAddresses[lastCitizenPaid].send(citizensAmounts[lastCitizenPaid]) ()
detectors.markdown: [ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle()]() has external calls inside a loop: [citizensAddresses[lastCitizenPaid].send(citizensAmounts[lastCitizenPaid])]()

detectors.description: Pragma version^0.4.9 () allows old versions
solc-0.4.9 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.9 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description: Variable ProtectTheCastle.SIX_HOURS () is not in mixedCase

Reentrancy in ProtectTheCastle.repairTheCastle() ():
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.send(msg.value - 100000000000000000000) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- amountInvested += amount ()
	- citizensAddresses.push(msg.sender) ()
	- citizensAmounts.push(amount * 2) ()
	- lastReparation = block.timestamp ()
	- piggyBank += (amount * 5 / 100) ()
	- totalCitizens += 1 ()

	- [citizensAmounts.push(amount * 2)]()
